i Our premium burgers are cooked to order, not ona \
conveyor belt like some Red Bird “Gourmet” burger places
do so we can cook them they way you want!

Rare: cool red center; soft
Medium Rare: warm red center; firmer, very juicy
Medium: pink and firm

Medium Well: small amount of pink in the center
\ Well Done: gray-brown throughout; firm & dry /

We have a burger for every taste (even vegetarians)!! If there is
something you do NOT want on your burger, let us know and we
will take it off. Due to the many choices & thought put into their
composition, we ask that you do not substitute or add items.

* Items marked with an asterisk may be cooked to order.
Consuming raw or under-cooked meat, poultry, seafood, shellfish
or eggs may increase your risk of foodborne illness, especially if
you have certain medical conditions.

We hope you enjoy your experience here at Ashley’s. We love to hear feedback, whether it is positive or gives
opportunities for improvement, so that we can continue to offer good food and good beer for our good friends.

We started in Ann Arbor, Michigan in 1983 with a simple premise:

Roy & Jeff More — Proprietors
ashleys.com

The Fatman’s s

of

Fun!

1. Welcome to Ashley's! Help us make your day fun!

2. No Whining! We will do our very best to make everyone
happy. You do not want to hear us whine, we don't want to hear
you. Life is too short, enjoy our great craft beers & have fun.

3. We will seat everyone in the order in which they arrive. Let us
know if your large party can be seated at separate tables. We will
do our best to quote accurate wait times. Sometimes we may be
a little off. If there is a seat at the bar, start enjoying our great
beer selection. Please refer to item #2 if you are not sure what to
do.

4. We enjoy educating our guests about craft beer. We will
happily give you a couple tastes to help you decide on a beer, but
by law you must purchase something. We can not give away beer.

5. Our chefs have put a lot of effort into crafting our unique
sandwiches and burgers. If there is something you do not want
on your burger or sandwich, let us know and we will remove
it. If you want to create your own burger we can do that but
please no substitions on our burgers and sandwiches.

Ask your server about Ashley's famous T-shiyts

“Life is too short to drink cheap beer”

“Friends don't let friends drink cheap beer”

“Beer doesn’t make you FAT, it makes you LEAN
...against tables, chairs, walls and ugly people”

Not all sayings available in all colors

Address: 338 S State St, Ann Arbor, MI 48104
Description: Busy Irish pub offers a jumbo beer list, microbrews, scotch aplenty & eclectic grub.

summary.snippet: "Ordered Tofu bomb burger, Pesto Fries, Cheese curds, and drinks."
"Good staff, unbeatable beer selection, decent food, fair prices."
"Service, food quality and happy hour prices, everything is so good here."

most_relevant.description: We went on a game day. It was very busy and  our server was new. Our food came out quickly but getting a beer took forever. We ordered waffle fries with bacon and ranch. We also got the poutine. Both were great but the poutine came in a little bowl. I thought it would have been larger, but it was still very tasty. The bathrooms are downstairs. They have outdoor seating. Their draft beer selection is large. I had a Carmel apple cider. It was delicious! The atmosphere is fun and easy going. It's definitely a fun place to go after a Michigan game. The manager was very nice to us and the staff was also friendly. They also have TV's everywhere.

I have been coming here for about 25 years or so now. I love the selection of beer they offer here. The Stilton fries are the bomb! I brought my cousin from Florida here in 2009, he still has his Ashley’s t-shirt. Today I stopped in for some pizza.
Lots of bees. Hard to get beers outside. Had two TVs but couldn't figure out how to put the tigers playoff game on. Fries are good.
My second time here. I went for dinner with friends the first time and just went again for the Lobster Fest. Such great service and food! I can't wait to go back for sweet potato fries!!!

We stopped here for lunch during off hours and we really enjoyed this place. Great food and service. They offer a huge variety of Michigan made draft beers. The decor is cozy with lots of beautiful rich woods. They have a nice room available in the basement for private parties and events. I will definitely go back.

Came here for late lunch after visiting UMich. Place was pretty empty and service was quick. We had the Boss (friend chicken burger), Texan burger, fried Brussels sprouts  and fried cod sandwich - all were really good. Place looked like a typical bar and can imagine it being packed on the weekends.
Love this little place! The food was actually good, our waitress was excellent and we had a nice table by the window!

I wanted to try the best burgers in Ann Arbor and this popped up. This did not disappoint. Even the mac and cheese was just so good! Baked in a cute individual pan this mac and cheese was the right amount of filling. You can tell it was made for you. I loved the burger as well! It's exactly what you expect from a classic pub burger and more! And did I mention waffle fries are the norm here? They were so good! Thank you!
